value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|As the legends say, it's dark as
the crypt...$k$pThere can be no doubt. This is the
realm of the dead.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|The land called Hel, where my
mother rules over those who have
died...$k$pAfter death, those who deserve
nothing more come to reside in
this dark realm.$k$pDead gather from all the realms,
and each and every one grants
my mother greater power.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Are you one of them? The dead?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|She certainly doesn't seem dead...
She's nothing like the soldiers we've
fought.$k$pAnd her skin is positively glowing!$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|My skin?$k$pYes, I am mortal... I do not have the
power to rise again, like my mother's
troops...$k$pIf I could fight, die, and rise like they,
perhaps my mother would think
better of me. I am worthless...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Eir...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Her keep is not far. I will show you
the way.$k$p

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|You again.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Líf...the first King of Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|The realm of the dead is no place
for the likes of you, living boy.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_M_Normal,Face|Death cannot be defied.$k$pBut, like all the living, you will not
truly comprehend this until your
own death comes.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Careful. This place...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Blood... Crusted everywhere...$k$pAn execution site? Or are people
tortured here? It's unfathomable.$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|This...is where I lived.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What... What do you mean by that?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|My duty...was to die.$k$pI am not like other mortals, or so
my mother explained...$k$pMy body had a great many lives
within it, bestowed to me by the
dragon of life...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Many lives? What do you mean?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Mortals only have one...but I carried
thousands upon thousands inside
myself.$k$pEven if I die, the next day...
I live again.$k$pAnd so my mother brought me
here, and she killed me...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Her own daughter! How could she?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Each time a mortal dies, my mother
grows stronger.$k$pSo she killed me. Day after day... After
day, after day, after day, after day...$k$pMortals experience death once...
They taste that pain just one time.
For them, it is quick and merciful.$k$pFor me, however...it was agony without
end. Every day, I died, and that pain...
I experienced it once again.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Eir...$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|But that is at its end, now, too.$k$pMy lives have been exhausted.$k$pAll my thousands of deaths have
become my mother's strength...$k$pTo my mother, I am now worthless.
This life is all that remains.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Eir... Your mother, to have done
that... To have that done to you...$k$pSo that's why you ran.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Perhaps... Perhaps that is so.$k$p$Sbs150|
